summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackReveal visibly younger looking skin in just one week with Neutrogena's anti-aging Rapid Wrinkle Repair Regenerating Cream. This anti-wrinkle face cream with retinol and hyaluronic acid helps moisturize & smooth skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsRetinol cream fades the look of deep wrinkles - even crow's feet and forehead and cheek wrinklesMoisturizer with purified hyaluronic acid which smooths the look of fine lines & plumps skinAnti-wrinkle cream contains Accelerated Retinol SA and Glucose Complex for rapid, effective resultsMoisturizer reduces the look of skin aging 5 times more than a leading prestige anti-wrinkle productRetinol moisturizer from a dermatologist-recommended skin care brandKey IngredientsDelivers the highest concentration of Accelerated Retinol SA deep into skin's surface quickly and effectivelyGlucose Complex acts as a Retinol SA booster to accelerate skin's surface activity for rapid resultsHyaluronic acid adds line plumping moisture to help hydrate, replenish, and rejuvenate the look of your skinResearch ResultsVisibly smoother and younger-looking skin in just one weekItem 2501816How To UseApply twice daily to cleansed face and neck. Smooth a pearl-sized amount evenly in gentle massaging strokes until fully absorbed. Replace and tighten cap when not in use. For retinol beginners, gradually phase into your skincare routine, working up to twice daily as tolerated. In the daytime, always protect skin with a Broad Spectrum SPF 30 sunscreen or higher.Precautions: You may experience mild redness, a warm, tingling sensation or flaking (skin exfoliation). These are normal, temporary indications that the formula is working. If effects persist/cause discomfort, reduce the frequency of use until your skin adjusts, then revert to daily use as tolerated. Avoid contact with eyes - if contact occurs, rinse well with water. In case of irritation, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, seek medical assistance. Use a sunscreen and limit sun exposure while using this product.IngredientsWater, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Glycerin, Dimethicone, PPG-15 Stearyl Ether, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Glyceryl Behenate, Ceteareth-20, Isohexadecane, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cellulose, Sodium Polyacrylate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Crosspolymer, Polyacrylamide, Fragrance, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Chlorphenesin, Polysorbate 20, Hydrolyzed Myrtus Communis Leaf Extract, Retinol, BHT, Sodium Hyaluronate, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, Laureth-7, Ascorbic Acid
how_to_use: Apply twice daily to cleansed face and neck. Smooth a pearl-sized amount evenly in gentle massaging strokes until fully absorbed. Replace and tighten cap when not in use. For retinol beginners, gradually phase into your skincare routine, working up to twice daily as tolerated. In the daytime, always protect skin with a Broad Spectrum SPF 30 sunscreen or higher.Precautions: You may experience mild redness, a warm, tingling sensation or flaking (skin exfoliation). These are normal, temporary indications that the formula is working. If effects persist/cause discomfort, reduce the frequency of use until your skin adjusts, then revert to daily use as tolerated. Avoid contact with eyes - if contact occurs, rinse well with water. In case of irritation, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, seek medical assistance. Use a sunscreen and limit sun exposure while using this product.

reviews.headline: Great Wrinkle Cream
reviews.comments: I have been using this wrinkle repair cream for years.  I was happy to see that I could use my gift card and purchase from ULTA

reviews.headline: Works great!
reviews.comments: My skin was a wreck postpartum and after 5 months of just using Cerave while exclusively breastfeeding and needed to find a new retinol cream when we switched to formula before I returned to work. I purchased this product as I read most people saw fast results with this product. After a few days of using this product I noticeably saw a difference and now after two weeks of use my skin looks significantly better. Im very glad I took the leap and purchased. I highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Quick results for me!
reviews.comments: I have used this in the past but somehow got sidetracked with other products. I'm so glad I went back to this tried and true cream. Within a week, my skin was plumper, smoother, and best of all: my fines lines are already disappearing. I am 58 years old and you can't tell my age by my facial skin. I plan on keeping it that way by using this cream regularly once again!

reviews.headline: A Must
reviews.comments: Leave your face looking fresh and smooth and within a short time frame you begin to notice the difference

reviews.headline: This product actually works ngl
reviews.comments: I will say it takes a while but as expected in order for it to work I apply it daily!

reviews.headline: burning
reviews.comments: after using a couple of weeks my face started burning. I used it last night and my face is still red!

reviews.headline: Great results - over two years of use!
reviews.comments:
I've been using Neutrogena Rapid Wrinkle Repair Regenerating Cream for 2+ years and really love it. My skin is smoother and my crows feet look less pronounced. I used to have bumpy, uneven skin texture. Now it's smooth and hydrated, and most of the hyperpigmentation has faded or is completely gone. Oh, and my Dermatologist recommended it!

Pro tips: If you are thinking of trying this product make sure you use SPF 30 (or higher) when you go out in the sun! And ease your skin into a routine of AM/PM applications because the beneficial ingredients may require some getting used to, but the results are amazing.

reviews.headline: While I like the feel of this product, no visible results
reviews.comments:
This product feels good, goes on smoothly, but after using for 3-4 weeks see no visible results.

Am I expecting too much?

reviews.headline: Yes,  I would buy again
reviews.comments: So far happy with the cream.

reviews.headline: This product brightens my day!
reviews.comments: Seriously yall I LOVE this. I got a small trial sized jar and I've been using for a week and half. It is amazing the wrinkles on my forehead are no longer visible and the crows feet & under eye wrinkles are starting to clear.my face is smoother, brighter, firm, and glowing.

reviews.headline: Love the product
reviews.comments: Product lives up it's standards. The retinol is a plus. Feels smooth on my face snd neck.

reviews.headline: Neutrogena Rapid Wrinkle Repair
reviews.comments: I love the tingle and how smooth my face feels.

reviews.headline: I love neutragena products
reviews.comments: My skin feels nice

reviews.headline: I would definitely recommend this
reviews.comments: I love it, I have seen a big difference in my skin since I bought it.

reviews.headline: I would never buy this again
reviews.comments: BURNS!!! It gets rid of wrinkles temporarily bc it burns so bad, wherever you put it will swell!

reviews.headline: This product burned my face badly!
reviews.comments: Neutrogena Rapid Repair badly burned my face! Johnson and Johnson refuses to put a warning on it. Please do not take the risk of being burned!

reviews.headline: Not recommending it for Sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I bough it yesterday used it last night and today morning my skin have red patches and it burns and itch so bad .. I almost went to er ..

reviews.headline: no
reviews.comments: does not  work as stated by company

reviews.headline: This stuff is amazing
reviews.comments: I have tried many creams and lotions, most recently Perricone MD, This stuff is amazing, Try it you will not be disappointed

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: Very good product

faceoff_positive.comments: I hate buying things that promise but do not deliver, so I redid a favorite experiment. The plan was to treat the R side of my face with this cream and perform my normal routine on the L side. For a week, because that was the advertising promise I have never had a cream or serum or balm pass this test, since both sides of my face have looked the same at the end of the test. This time, I stopped the test after two days, the improvement was so obvious. What a wonderful surprise. My lips are plumped up, my deep wrinkles are flattening out, my smaller wrinkles are disappearing. Bravo! This is AWESOME!
faceoff_positive.headline: Unexpected results halt mini science project

faceoff_negative.comments: I have been using both the Rapid Wrinkle Repair  Cream and the Rapid Wrinkle Repair retinol oil for at least 6 months. I am into my 2nd jar/container.  I have noticed a difference on my squint lines and the cross lines on my cheeks. I also use it on my neck and chest. I wish I had seen more improvement on my labial creases and lip lines through. People tell me all the time I don't look my age so it must be working! I do get peeling around my nasal creases and on the bridge of my nose so much so that I have gone to every other day. Do you have a product for lip lines? I have never been a smoker.
faceoff_negative.headline: I have noticed improvement on cheek cross lines
